2021.baseline: The first international conference dedicated to API Platform and its ecosystem

covid.description_1: A proof of COVID-19 vaccination {{pass_link}} will be required and if you don’t have one, you must provide a negative COVID-19 viral test taken within two calendar days
covid.description_2: COVID viral (PCR) testing is available at {{testing_link}}, usually by appointment. Many pharmacies can do serologic (antigen/rapid) tests.

measures.disinfectant: Disinfectants will be provided throughout the conference spaces.
measures.mask2: Face masks will be given out.
measures.seats: Only one in two seats will be available

covid.subtitle: In order to let our attendees enjoy the on-site conference in the safest conditions, we follow the sanitary protocols recommended by official health organizations.
covid.title: Covid-19 sanitary measures
covid.update_measures: We will update these recommendations as necessary.

our_speakers.subtitle: Join international speakers sharing their knowledge on English-speaking (streamed online) and French-speaking tracks.

review.subtitle_1: Thank you again for joining and trusting us on this first edition!
review.subtitle_2: We are looking forward to seeing you all again next year.
review.title: It was a blast

venue.subtitle: The on-site edition will take place in Lille, meeting point of European cities and touristic capital of the Flemish region. If you can't attend the event physically, you can watch the English-speaking track online.
venue.tip: Once you’re arrived in Lille, we advice you to use public transports or local bike-sharing systems.

review.subtitle_2: We hope you enjoyed it as much as we loved organizing it.

2024.baseline: The flagship conference dedicated to API Platform and its ecosystem is back in Lille, France, on 19 and 20 September 2024.

review.subtitle_1: Thank you for participating in the API Platform Conference 2024 and for your continued trust. This edition broke all records, on every level.

review.title: Time for the PHP revolution!

venue.subtitle: The on-site edition will take place in Lille, meeting point of European cities and touristic French city. If you can't come to Lille, you can watch the event online.
venue.tip:
Hotel demand is very high in Lille at this time of year, so to make your travel easier, we have negotiated special prices.

Take a look at the available rooms on {{tip_link}}, get a 10% discount on your stay, and book them as soon as possible with this code:

TILLEULS24

This code is valid for the following hotels: Arbre Voyageur BW Premier Collection 4*, Best Western Why Premier 4*, Boa BW Signature Collection 4*, La Valiz 3*, Kanai 3*, and Le Rosa 3* for stays between 18th and 22nd September.

This discount is available until 4th September 2024.

2025.baseline: Join us on September 18 and 19, 2025, in Lille and online, to celebrate the 10th anniversary of the API Platform framework.

cfp.title: Call for papers
cfp.subtitle: The call for papers for API Platform Conference 2025 opens on January 6 and runs until March 23. Final speakers will be announced starting May 14. Submit your pitch, and with a bit of luck, you could join us for this special anniversary edition!

package.title: Speaker package
package.subtitle: Speaker package includes:
package.point_3: Entrance to the conference and to the birthday party on Thursday 18th
package.point_4: Two hotel nights for speakers based in France, or three nights for speakers coming from outside France
package.point_5: If your employer can cover your travel and hotel, we’re happy to list them as a sponsor. Employer sponsorship allows us to invite more international speakers to the conference.
package.point_6: A gift box with some attentions.

techno.title: Talk us about your favorite techno!

subject.title: Talk categories
subject.subtitle: We are looking forward to talks on (but not limited to) these topics:

categories.title: API Platform and its ecosystem
points: You have discovered new features, a use case, a migration story or a contribution to share with the API Platform framework.
You have built applications for real-world enterprise scenarios and your talk will showcase your development’s journey – from initial adoption to implementation.
You have used API Platform as a key tool in your API design.

categories.title: Going further with API Platform
points: JavaScript - API Platform is not only about PHP: in addition to its powerful admin generator, API Platform also features a client generator capable of scaffolding fully functional applications with Next.js, Nuxt.js, React/Redux, Vue.js, Quasar, and Vuetify for both PWAs and SPAs. Share your insights, contributions, and discoveries about it!
Devops - you host or you have deployed a project with API Platform: tell us about it!
Share your experiments on using AI on your web project.

categories.title: FrankenPHP
points: You’ve optimized your application’s performance or migrated it with FrankenPHP.
You’ve deployed FrankenPHP natively or using a cloud hosting solution. Share your feedback with us!

categories.title: Frameworks and tools
points: Share with us your findings or best practices regarding tools from the PHP ecosystem.
Tell us about the tools and good practices you use to build your software’s architecture.

categories.title: Society
points: Different management, corporate culture, mental health, agility, or the struggle for greater diversity and inclusion in tech... We always open the floor to more cross-cutting topics during our event.

cfp.point_1: The API Platform Conference is an international event held in France, featuring two parallel tracks over two days in both English and French.
cfp.point_2: The talks are 20 or 40 min (Q&A included).
cfp.point_3: The event is hybrid: your talk will be streamed live online and recorded. Unless you advise otherwise, it will be published on our YouTube channel after the event.
cfp.point_4: Submitting multiple proposals is encouraged, but it does not necessarily increase your chances of selection.
cfp.point_5: While we prefer original content, submitting a previously presented conference topic is not grounds for elimination. Each talk is unique and never delivered in the same way.
cfp.point_6: Speakers are expected to uphold the same Code of Conduct as attendees and staff.

venue.place:
Be part of this exceptional event located at less than 1 hour from Paris and Brussels, 1h30 from London.
Conferences will be held in EuraTechnologies, the 1st incubator & startups accelerator in France.
venue.title: The venue
